thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Bruce Pearce
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Bruce Pearce

author: Bruce Pearce
title: Bruce Pearce
text: It is a really helpful site. Due to my inexperience I picked a really bad company for my first solar installation about 6 years ago. This time, I had good responses from three companies, all offering different ideas and I finally chose one which gave me the confidence to believe I have made the right choice.
